ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and others of them, yoked together in chains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And many others bound in bond.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and others that were bound with chains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The rest of the devils were bound in chains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And other demons bound in chains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And also others bound in fetters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and others also, coupled in fetters:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And others linked together in chains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and others [too] bound together in chains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: As also others bound together in fetters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And also others bound in fetters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and others joined together by (iron) fetters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And others bound together in shackles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:38] and others too, from among them, bounded together in fetters, in shackles with their hands tied to their necks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And others) and other than these (linked together in chains) in iron chains; these are the rebellious devils who were never entrusted with any work except that they rebelled,
